column5: Is Mclaren's Marina (near Linsay) open????  They dont answer the phone or return my email.  Thanks.
Is this the number you are calling?  1- 877- 462- 5863  Email: [emailÂ protected]  Their website is here.... http://www.mclarensmarina.com/
havn't seen any activity going on for a week or so, think they may only be there weekends
Thats the numbers and email i have tried.  I guess i will keep calling and then on saturday i will call.  Thanks

if they dont sell quads or snowmobiles, some marinas close for a month or more during the winter,but they usually re-direct there calls and check there e-mail.good luck....just thought i would try and help
